text: Destinies of Women () is an East German film. It was released in 1952, and sold more than 5,100,000 tickets.List of the 50 highest-grossing DEFA films. It was produced as a propaganda film which compared the lives of women in the two sides of divided Germany. The women in East Berlin were politically aware and organized while those in West Berlin were vain and materialistic. == Cast == * Sonja Sutter - Renate Ludwig * Lotte Loebinger - Hertha Scholz * Anneliese Book - Barbara Berg * - Anni Neumann * - Isa von Trautwald * Gertrud Meyen - Betty Vogt * Maly Delschaft - Frau Ludwig * Angela Brunner - Ursula Krenz * - Gertrud Neumann * - Prosecutor * - Frau Becker * Karla Runkehl - Freundin von Renate ==References== ==External links== * Category:1952 films Category:East German films Category:Films set in Berlin Category:Films directed by Slatan Dudow
title: Frauenschicksale
